title: Higher latitude chain (Lat -84.5, Long 77.2), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field in Antarctica, 1-sec raw data. Station deployed Jan 2008 under NSF award ATM-922979 - C. R. Clauer (Virginia Tech.)

parameters.name: thg_mag_pg1
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_pg1
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg1']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_pg1
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg1']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_pg1
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg1']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
